org.apache.twill.api

Interface TwillRunnable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTwillRunnable, BundledJarRunnable

    public interface TwillRunnable
extends Runnable
    The TwillRunnable interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed in a Twill cluster.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TwillRunnableSpecification configure()
      Called at submission time.
      void destroy()
      Called when the Runnable.run() completed.
      void handleCommand(Command command)
      Called when a command is received.
      void initialize(TwillContext context)
      Called when the container process starts.
      void stop()
      Requests to stop the running service.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable

        run

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        TwillRunnableSpecification configure()
        Called at submission time. Executed on the client side.
        Returns:
        A TwillRunnableSpecification built by TwillRunnableSpecification.Builder.

      • initialize

        void initialize(TwillContext context)
        Called when the container process starts. Executed in container machine. If any exception is thrown from this method, this runnable won't get retry.
        Parameters:
        context - Contains information about the runtime context.

      • handleCommand

        void handleCommand(Command command)
            throws Exception
        Called when a command is received. A normal return denotes the command has been processed successfully, otherwise Exception should be thrown.
        Parameters:
        command - Contains details of the command.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • stop

        void stop()
        Requests to stop the running service.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Called when the Runnable.run() completed. Useful for doing resource cleanup. This method would only get called if the call to initialize(TwillContext) was successful.
